body:
Using gcc-10.3.0 on a recent spack install, querying `compiler.cxx14_flag ` throws the following error:

==> Error: JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

This leads to an error bootstrapping clingo:

_Originally posted by @frobnitzem in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/25164#issuecomment-1057078417_
title: compiler.cxx14_flag error
